Sunset in the World of Norrath

Taken by Chett Darkforest
Title: Setting sun in the World of Norrath
Chett_Darkforest@hotmail.com

Within the world of Norrath there can be found some spectacular skies. Everything can be found from the first light in the early morning, to the flaringly bright orange and pink skies at sunset. There can also be leaden gray skies that sometimes deliever rain or snow. As well as, the pale light of the full moon that makes soft hues, or the total darkness of a full moon as the moon goes thru its phases witin the game. All of which makes the player become more immersed within the world of Norrath.
